name: AYOP

activities.title: Own Pace Monday
activities.description: Every Monday at 7pm, we deliver structured, coach-led interval training that builds rhythm, consistency, and long-term progress — together on the track. Open to all levels. Scaled to your pace.

activities.title: City To Trail
activities.description: Once a month, we guide you out of the city and into the dirt with slow, social long runs designed for exploration, endurance, and connection. No racing. No pressure. Just time on feet.

activities.title: Lunch & Learn
activities.description: In 45-minute online sessions, we bring voices from running, culture, and creativity to share stories, insights, and ideas you can carry into your own practice.

activities.title: Bridge The Gap
activities.description: Through curated run-led events, we connect communities, cultures, and brands — using movement as the starting point for meaningful exchange. From pop-up runs to cultural collaborations.

teamMissions.Partnership: We create meaningful events and partnerships that connect communities, brands, and culture — building real value through shared experiences, not just visibility.
teamMissions.Media: We document and translate the AYOP experience through visuals and storytelling, capturing the emotion, movement, and culture that live beyond the run itself.
teamMissions.Track: We design and deliver structured, inclusive training that meets runners where they are — building rhythm, confidence, and long-term progression at every pace.

aboutpara: We run with our lives, our rhythms, and our choices — shaping a culture where every step reflects who we are.
aboutparaTwo:
AYOP is a Berlin-based running community built around consistency, inclusivity, and respect for individual pace.
We train together on the track, explore trails beyond the city, and create space where running connects people, culture, and everyday life.
manifesto:
A crew, a community, a movement.
At your own pace, we find our improvement.
Not a race, not a chase — this is our space.
No chasing. No changing.
We rise while remaining.
The rat race dangles,
but it won't shape our angles.

We run the streets — city beats beneath our feet.
We run the track — rhythm over records, never looking back.
We run the trails — where the air grows thin and the spirit prevails.

Some days fast, some days slow,
still we move, still we grow.

Step by step, stride by stride,
freedom and joy are what we ride.

Together we run. Together we rise.
No one alone. No one denied.

AYOP.
At Your Own Pace. Always.
